about_the_game:
In Walking Survival, the darkness is closing in, and monstrous creatures are coming for you! Harness the power of magic, develop unique abilities, and obliterate waves of enemies before they overwhelm you.

🔮 Master the Walking – Choose from a variety of magical abilities, upgrade them, and create devastating spell combinations.

👹 Endless Waves of Enemies – Face creatures with different strengths, weaknesses, and unpredictable attack patterns.

🛡️ Survive Against All Odds – Dodge, strike, and strategize as you fight to stay alive in an ever-escalating battle.

🌟 Powerful Upgrades – Unlock new skills, enhance your magic, and become an unstoppable force.

How long can you survive the relentless onslaught? Unleash your power and carve your own legend in Walking Survival!

🔥 Wishlist now and prepare for battle! 🔥

name: Walking Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core™ i3-3220 / AMD Phenom II X6 1100T
  • Memory: 3 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 570 / AMD R7 370
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core™ i5-8600 / AMD Ryzen 5-5600
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 / AMD R9 Fury
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
